mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_INFO(BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_TYPE, INPUT_USER_ID, BOARD_PASS, BOARD_DESC, INPUT_DATE) values(#{BOARD_TITLE}, 'QNA', #{INPUT_USER_ID}, #{BOARD_PASS}, #{BOARD_DESC}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select BOARD_IDX, BOARD_TITLE, INPUT_USER_ID, INPUT_DATE, BOARD_HITS, ATTACHED_FILE from BOARD_INFO order by BOARD_IDX DESC
mapper.update: update BOARD_INFO set BOARD_HITS=BOARD_HITS+1 where BOARD_IDX=#{id}
mapper.select: select BOARD_IDX, BOARD_TITLE, INPUT_USER_ID, INPUT_DATE, BOARD_DESC, BOARD_HITS, BOARD_PASS, INPUT_DATE, ATTACHED_FILE from BOARD_INFO where BOARD_IDX=#{id}
mapper.update: update BOARD_INFO set BOARD_TITLE=#{BOARD_TITLE}, BOARD_DESC=#{BOARD_DESC} where BOARD_IDX=#{BOARD_IDX}
